name: lumiose-galette
effect: Cures all major status ailments and confusion.
short_effect: Cures all major status ailments and confusion.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A popular treat in Lumiose City.
It can be used once to heal all the
status conditions of a Pokémon.
